title: Shi Wangzhe A? 5th Season

synonyms: 是王者啊？第5季 凤舞雷霆长安卷
Shi Wangzhe A? 5th Season: Feng Wu Leiting Chang An Juan

synopsis:
Sikong Zhen discovers the mechanical beasts in the underground city and studies them privately. Wu Zetian notices something amiss and sends Shangguan Wan'er to investigate secretly, while the Yaotian organization also has its own plans… Several forces intertwine, creating a turbulent undercurrent. Faced with the eventual outbreak of a common crisis, everyone, for the safety of Chang'an, overcomes all difficulties and works together to defeat the mechanical monsters, restoring peace to Chang'an.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
